item.title: Siemens Advantage Navigator Energy & Sustainability
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Vulnerability CVE 2021-44228 fixed on central cloud service starting 2021-12-13; no user actions necessary. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Advantage Navigator Software Proxy
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. item.title: Siemens Affected Products
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link pdf https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-501673.pdf CSAF https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/csaf/ssa-501673.json Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL NCSC-NL Siemens requested to directly refer to their website: See pdf for the complete list of affected products, CSAF for automated parsing of data Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-22 10:53:47 NCSC-NL Updated community note.

item.title: Siemens Capital
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Only affected if Teamcenter integration feature is used. Currently no remediation is available. Find detailed mitigations steps at:Mitigations Link; See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Cerberus DMS
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Remove the JndiLookup class from the class-path. Detailed instructions are available here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Comos Desktop App
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Uninstall “Teamcenter Client Communication System (TCSS)” or block both incoming and outgoing connections between the system and the Internet. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Energy Engage
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Find detailed remediation and mitigation information on the EnergyIP docs portal. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens EnergyIP
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Note: EnergyIP V8.5 and V8.6 applications are not directly affected, but CAS is. Find detailed remediation and mitigation information on the EnergyIP docs portal. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens EnergyIP Prepay
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Specific mitigation information has been released for the customer projects with the request of immediate deployment. The long-term solution of updating the log4j2 component to a fix version is being tested and will be released, once confirmed being safe for the particular product version in line with the project Service Level Agreements.

item.title: Siemens Enlightened Amaze
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Vulnerabilities fixed on central cloud services starting 2021-12-10; no user actions necessary. For Comfy and Enlighted, see the Additional Information section and further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
